snippet.title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gods and guns collide in Flintlock, a new open world action-RPG from the makers of Ashen. Join Nor and her mysterious companion, Enki, and embark on an epic journey of vengeance, gunpowder and magic in humanity's last stand.

Your battle begins 2023 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox One and Xbox Series S|X! Available day one with Game Pass.

Find out more: https://linktr.ee/playflintlock
